import React, { useState } from "react"; const TermsandCondition = () => { const [accepted, setAccepted] = useState(false); const handleAccept = () => { setAccepted(true); alert("Thank you for accepting the Terms and Conditions!"); }; return (

Terms and Conditions

Welcome to our platform! By accessing or using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

  1. Use of Service: You must not misuse our platform in any way.

  4. Termination: We may terminate your access at our discretion.
  5. Changes to Terms: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team. Thank you for understanding and agreeing to our Terms and Conditions!

) } export default TermsandCondition
